attributes.action: Stop all restrictions on families meeting on Christmas day
attributes.additional_details:
Family time and gatherings are essential for both moral and especially mental health.

Having our loved ones around us especially on such special days like Christmas is essential and has always been a highlight and always should be a highlight and certaintie for all
attributes.background:
All restrictions on families gatherings to be lifted

Christmas is an essential day of family where some members literally get that one day to share and make memories

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552415
